name: Santa Fe Mysteries: The Elk Moon Murder
name_original: Santa Fe Mysteries: The Elk Moon Murder
description:
Santa Fe Mysteries: The Elk Moon Murder is an adventure game developed by Activision. It was originally released in 1996. It was published by Activision Value Publishing. On review aggregator Metacritic, Santa Fe Mysteries: The Elk Moon Murder has a score of 59.
Santa Fe Mysteries: The Elk Moon Murder is available on PC.
